title: Skepta cradles his daughter River on her first birthday in rare sweet photograph
text:

Skepta has shared a rare picture of his daughter River on social media.

The rapper, 37, melted his fans' hearts with the super cute photograph on Instagram on Saturday.

In the snap, the shirtless tattooed musician cuddled his little girl and put a supportive hand on her back.

River looked lovely in pink as she celebrated her first birthday with her dad.

The photograph was a snap of the sweet Polaroid the dad and daughter had taken on the little girl's big day.

It is the first picture Skepta has posted of his girl on his Instagram grid.

(Image: Instagram)

"Happy 1st birthday my angel," he wrote in the caption.

His supermodel ex-girlfriend Naomi Campbell posted three hearts and an angelic emoji with a halo in the comments.

Last year, Skepta had announced his daughter's birth with a social media post which has since been deleted from his account.

(Image: ABACA/PA Images)

The dad-of-one has kept his parenting role under wraps while he focuses on his music career.

In recent weeks, Skepta courted the attention of headlines with the rumours of his romance with Adele.

The singers have been firm friends for years and their bond has reportedly flourished into a budding romance.

A source told The Sun: "No one saw it coming but there's a whirlwind romance going on between Adele and Skepta.

"It's been a bit of a brief fling so far. But these are two people who very much care about each other very much as friends so it's very exciting times.

"The fact Skepta has met Laura and James seems like a positive sign. Everyone wants the best for them both."
description: Skepta gave his 2million fans a look at his daughter's first birthday as he shared a rare snap of him cuddling her
